particle.title: particle
particle.description: A particle object that will play particles at the location

particle.title: particle
particle.description: The particle to play. Use the in-game particle names (ex. flame, cloud, instant_effect)

amount.title: amount
amount.description: The amount of particles to spawn

item.title: item
item.description: The item to use for block breaking particles. Can be left blank

damage.title: damage
damage.description: The damage to deal to the target

knockback.title: knockback
knockback.description: The knockback to deal to the target

magnitude.title: magnitude
magnitude.description: The horizontal magnitude of the knockback. Can be negative to pull in.

y-magnitude.title: y-magnitude
y-magnitude.description: The vertical magnitude of the knockback. Can be negative to pull down

summon.title: summon
summon.description: Use this to summon mobs at the target's location

mob_id.title: mob_id
mob_id.description: The mob to spawn. Specify the mob's ID

amount.title: amount
amount.description: The amount of mobs to spawn

radius.title: radius
radius.description: The radius of which to spawn the mobs in. Does not check for block collisions

status_effect.title: status_effect
status_effect.description: Applies a Status Effect to the target

name.title: name
name.description: The internal name of the Status Effect. This is NOT the Display Name.

duration.title: duration
duration.description: The duration of the Status Effect in TICKS.

level.title: level
level.description: The level of the Status Effect.
